about.title: About FilePay
about.mission: FilePay makes selling digital files simple and secure. Our mission is to empower creators, entrepreneurs, and businesses to monetize their digital content without the complexity of traditional e-commerce platforms.
about.story: Built by a solo dev to make selling files simple. FilePay was born from the frustration of complex e-commerce setups and the need for a straightforward solution to sell digital products. We believe that sharing your work and getting paid for it should be as easy as sending a link.

simplicity.title: Simplicity First
simplicity.description: We prioritize ease of use over complex features. Upload, price, share - that's it.

security.title: Security & Trust
security.description: Your files and payments are protected with enterprise-grade security measures.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using FilePay, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

description.title: 2. Service Description
description.content: FilePay is a platform that allows users to sell digital files through secure payment links. We provide the infrastructure for file hosting, payment processing, and delivery to customers.

userResponsibilities.title: 3. User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.content: Users are responsible for ensuring they have the right to sell the digital content they upload. Users must not upload illegal, copyrighted, or harmful content to our platform.

payments.title: 4. Payments and Fees
payments.content: FilePay charges a small transaction fee for each successful sale. Payment processing is handled securely through our trusted payment partners. Sellers receive payouts according to our standard schedule.

privacy.title: 5. Privacy Policy
privacy.content: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. We collect only the information necessary to provide our services and never sell your data to third parties.

termination.title: 6. Termination
termination.content: Either party may terminate this agreement at any time. Upon termination, your access to the service will be discontinued, but previously sold files will remain accessible to customers who purchased them.
